class.name: commander.tasks.knowledges.Attack
class.description: The knowledge of the 'Attack' mission. This knowledge is used by the commander agent to perform this mission.

method.name: getReachable
method.description: Returns the area of responsability of the company.

method.name: getNbrFront
method.description: Returns the number of first line units. The returned value is the one defined by the user when he issues the mission. If no value is defined, it returns a value of '2'.

method.name: getObjectives
method.description: Returns the final objective positions (the ending positions between the right and left boundaries of each first line units that performs the attack mission).
